article:
Robots seem new to most people, but they have a long history. The first one was made by a Greek.
The robots in the films are usually stronger, faster and cleverer than people. In real life, most robots are used in factories. They are used to do many dangerous, difficult or boring _ . Some people can't look after _ and robots can help them. For example, some people can't see, and they use dogs to help themselves move around. This kind of dog is called a guide dog  . But now scientists are making robots help them. In the future, robot dogs may take the place of   these guide dogs.
Today robots are _ used in American hospitals. In the hospital, a robot _ meals from the kitchen to the sick people's rooms. It never lost its way because it has a _ of the hospital in its computer system .
Robots can help us in a lot of different ways. However, they will never take the place of humans.
